title: Macquarie to Pay $23 Million Fine for Short-Sale Failures
description: Macquarie Group Ltd.’s Australian securities business admitted to misleading conduct in misreporting millions of short sales over several years and agreed to pay a A$35 million ($23 million) fine.
content: Macquarie Group Ltd.’s Australian securities business admitted to misleading conduct in misreporting millions of short sales over several years and agreed to pay a A$35 million ($23 million) fine.
